display_frame.description: Displays an OpenCV image in a window. This function will load and show the provided image and wait for a keypress. Press any key to close the window.

inputs.name: window_name
inputs.description: The name of the window in which the frame will be shown.

inputs.name: image_name
inputs.description: The name of the image file to open and display. default name is live.jpg

output.description: This function does not return a value; it displays a window on the screen.
